item.description:
At our last meeting, Carl Norloff presented the Zone Labs (ZoneDiet.com) site to us, which includes an excellent implementation of AspDotNetStorefront and Engage Publish. As a bonus, the lead developer was also present, and provided some great insight into the project. We also spent a good portion of the meeting sharing both DNN design and development knowledge, so everyone attending came away with some great tips/tricks that many of us have learned the hard way.

The next meeting is this coming Monday (1st Monday of every month!), and will include another knowledge share - including the design and development of multilingual sites, DNN resources, customization or replacement of the text editor, and skinning tips and techniques for both designers and developers, and much more.

Please come prepared to share any tips / tricks that you have found useful in working with DNN!
item.name: DNN Boston monthly meeting
